name: Problem Analysis Team
description: AI-recommended team: AI-suggested team based on problem analysis

goals.title: Data Collection and Analysis for User Behavior Patterns & Purchase History
goals.description: Collect data on user behavior patterns such as browsing history, purchasing habits etc.

goals.title: Implementing Collaborative Filtering Algorithm
goals.description: The algorithm is used to recommend products based on the behavior of a user.

goals.title:
Analyze 
    Build a comprehensive e-c...
goals.description:
Conduct thorough analysis of the problem: 
    Build a comprehensive e-commerce recommendation system that can:
    1. Analyze user behavior patterns and purchase history
    2. Implement collaborative filtering and content-based algorithms
    3. Handle real-time recommendations with sub-100ms latency
    4. A/B test different recommendation strategies
    5. Scale to handle millions of users and products

goals.title: Design solution approach
goals.description: Design comprehensive solution approach using research expertise

goals.title: Implement solution
goals.description: Execute the designed solution with team coordination

goals.title: Validate and refine
goals.description: Test, validate, and refine the solution based on results
